sentences: In 2012, Phukan won the 59th National Film Awards as the best Music Director for his music in the Hindi short film Panchakki.
It capped an intermittent but creatively fecund career as a music director which began with the Raveena Tandon  production Stumped  in 2003.
Recently, he also composed for renowned director Jahnu Barua's films Baandhon and Ajeyo, both of which bagged the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Assamese.
Dhrubajyoti Phukan married singer Shaswati Phukan in 1991, and is the father of a daughter, Shreya Phukan, and a son, Ayushjyoti Phukan.
